name: Mecha Mayhem Demo
description:
In development

So what can you do in this Demo? basic stuff. Here are the controls (Controller only):
LS = movement
RS = camera rotation
A = Jump
B = Use heal (plays a sound on use). It also makes the player take 1 damage
Y = swap weapon
X = Punch
Start = change camera count (if not all 4 players are playing)
RB + Start = "fullscreen"
Select = Change Scene: in tutorial goes to testmap, in testmap to main menu
RT = Shoot
LT = Dash

In game, you can pickup up to 2 weapons, score goes up per kill, try out the rest
